Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util

Class BigArrayLong

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.util.BigArrayLong
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class BigArrayLong extends Object implements Serializable
An object for managing a large table of Java long values, similar to an array, but with larger capacity and able to expand dynamically. The table is composed of many arrays of longs called chunks which are allocated as needed, subtracting from a bounded memory budget if one is provided. Unlike arrays, which are indexed by ints, this table is indexed by longs.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BigArrayLong()
    Constructs a table of long values using the default chunk size and an unlimited memory budget.
    BigArrayLong(long chunk)
    Constructs a table of long values with a given chunk size and an unlimited memory budget.
    BigArrayLong(long chunk, MemoryBudget budget)
    Constructs a table of long values with a given chunk size and limited by a given memory budget.
    BigArrayLong(MemoryBudget budget)
    Constructs a table of long values with the default chunk size using the provided memory budget.
